item.title: Building a Secure API Gateway with Cognito
item.description: To enable authorization the api with Amazon Cognito User Pools: Create a user pool. Check out Secure your API Gateway with Amazon Cognito User Pools for a video tutorial. In the “Method Request” > “Auth” section of the API Gateway console, select the user pool.

item.title: Understanding OAuth 2.0: Explore with Amazon Cognito
item.description: Difference between OAuth2.0, OIDC and SAML2 # OAuth 2.0 provides authorization using ID token. OIDC provides authentication using access token. SAML2 provides both authentication and authorization. OAuth 2.0 # allows users to log in, agree to the OAuth permission grant, and generate an access token (like an API key).
